Text: PJM Committees RepresentationMr Steffes Your email was forwarded to me from Rick Drom that you will be replacing Tom Hoatson as the primary representative on the Members Committee Has Mr Hoatson left Enron Are you replacing him on all PJM related committees Our database shows that he is also a member on the following committees Energy Market Committee Planning Committee Tariff Advisory Committee Reliability Committee Transmission Owners Agreement Administrative Committee MEN Study Committee Credit User Group I will correct update the Members Committee roster and wait to hear back from you with respect to the other committees Thank you WaiMin Jew Database AnalystBusiness Tool Admin PJM Interconnection LLC
